trans-unit.source: Allows you to override attributes applied to properties, fields, and classes when you use an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize an object as encoded SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您覆寫屬性套用至屬性、 欄位和類別，當您使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化或還原序列化的物件做為編碼的 SOAP。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapAttributeOverrides class enables an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override the default way of serializing a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: SoapAttributeOverrides 類別可讓<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>覆寫序列化的物件集的預設方式。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL, even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫序列化這種方式有兩種用途︰ 首先，您可以控制和加強在 DLL 中，找到的物件序列化，即使您沒有存取來源。第二，您可以建立一組可序列化的類別，但是序列化多個方法中的物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，而非序列化為 XML 項目類別執行個體的成員，您可以將序列化它們做為 XML 屬性產生更有效率的文件中的傳輸。

trans-unit.source: After you create a SoapAttributeOverrides, you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 SoapAttributeOverrides 之後，您建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>方法的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: Pass the resulting object as an argument to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 做為引數傳遞的結果物件<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the data contained by the SoapAttributeOverrides to override attributes that control how objects are serialized.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>使用 SoapAttributeOverrides 所包含的資料來覆寫屬性，以控制如何序列化物件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the SoapAttributeOverrides contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> associated with each overridden object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要達成此目的，SoapAttributeOverrides 包含會覆寫的物件類型的集合，以及<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>與每個覆寫的物件類型相關聯。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含一組適合的控制每個欄位、 屬性或類別會序列化的屬性物件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The process for creating and using a SoapAttributeOverrides is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: 建立和使用 SoapAttributeOverrides 程序如下︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 建立會適當地覆寫物件的屬性物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, to override a field or property, create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, using the new, derived type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要覆寫欄位或屬性，請建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>，使用新的衍生類型。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can optionally assign a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性指派新<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>會覆寫基底類別的屬性名稱或命名空間。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add the attribute object to the appropriate <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> property or collection.
trans-unit.target: 將加入適當的屬性物件<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>屬性或集合。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and specify the member name that is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以將<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>物件<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>並指定要覆寫的成員名稱。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create a SoapAttributeOverrides.
trans-unit.target: 建立 SoapAttributeOverrides。

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the SoapAttributeOverrides using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>SoapAttributeOverrides 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: If the object being overridden is a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you need only specify the type of the overridden object.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫物件<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>，您只需要指定覆寫物件的類型。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果您正在覆寫欄位或屬性，您也必須指定覆寫的成員名稱。

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>方法的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: When constructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, pass the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 建構時<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>，傳遞<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>至<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Use the resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize the class objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用產生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化或還原序列化的類別物件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> to a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref>集合的<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter specifies an object to be overridden by the .
trans-unit.target: type 參數會指定由覆寫物件 。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含會造成的屬性物件的聯集<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>覆寫其序列化的預設行為的一組物件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: 您選擇的屬性物件置於<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，取決於您想要覆寫的特定行為。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>預設將類別成員序列化為 XML 項目。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要改為將序列化為 XML 屬性的成員，您會建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>，將它指派給<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，並將新增<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>至<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>至<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides></xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>使用 Add 方法

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to add a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute></xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>使用此多載

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> overrides the serialization of a class, you need not specify a member of the class to override, only the type of the class.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>覆寫序列化的類別，您不需要指定類別的成員，才能覆寫的類別類型</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>會覆寫的物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref>表示覆寫屬性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> to the collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> objects contained by the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref>集合<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref>所包含之物件<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter specifies the object to be overridden by the .
trans-unit.target: type 參數會指定由覆寫物件 。

trans-unit.source: The member parameter specifies the name of a member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: member 參數會指定為覆寫成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含會造成的屬性物件的聯集<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>覆寫其序列化的預設行為的一組物件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: 您選擇的屬性物件置於<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，取決於您想要覆寫的特定行為。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>預設將類別成員序列化為 XML 項目。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as a SOAP attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要改為序列化為 SOAP 屬性的成員，您會建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>，將它指派給<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，並將新增<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>至<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>方法來加入<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>至<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this method when the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains either a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法時<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>， <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>，或<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute></xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to override.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>要覆寫的物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to override.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref>表示覆寫屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定的 （基底類別） 類型相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes for a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此多載來傳回<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，其中包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>屬性</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The base class <xref:System.Type> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別<xref:System.Type>與您想要擷取的屬性的集合相關聯。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref>表示覆寫屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定的 （基底類別） 類型相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: The member parameter specifies the base class member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: member 參數會指定為覆寫基底類別成員。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes that override a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個多載來傳回<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，其中包含覆寫的屬性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>， <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>， <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>，或<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You can also return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains the override of a default value that uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以傳回<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，其中包含覆寫預設的值，其使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>，您必須使用指定的覆寫型別多載。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The base class <xref:System.Type> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to override.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別<xref:System.Type>與您想要覆寫的屬性的集合相關聯。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The name of the overridden member that specifies the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫指定的成員名稱<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref>傳回。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref>表示覆寫屬性的集合。
